snippet: The Archer Daniels Midland Company raised its offer for GrainCorp of Australia on Monday, valuing the grain processor at about $2.9 billion, as A.D.M. pressed ahead with its unsolicited takeover bid.
abstract: The Archer Daniels Midland Company raised its offer for GrainCorp of Australia on Monday, valuing the grain processor at about $2.9 billion, as A.D.M. pressed ahead with its unsolicited takeover bid.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Archer Daniels Raises Bid for GrainCorp
